archimate:WorkPackage.name: S&C Service transformation project
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation:
S&C Service transformation project
Goal:
Consolidate existing legacy solutions within Security & Compliance
Establish a clear set of new security services for our products & Customers
Based on the Tietoevry Connect Platform Development project, S&C Service Transformation will ensure all legacy solutions defined in TE Connect portfolio, under responsibility of Security & Compliance, will be migrated to the new solutions which were implemented in S&C Deployment project.
Dependencies:
Tietoevry Connect Portfolio Development project needs to establish a clear set of future state offering which is then used to evaluate which S&C services needs to be migrated from legacy.
S&C Deployment Project needs to be completed so that there is future state solution where services can be migrated.
Resourcing
Project resourcing needs to be revised after there is clarity what are the various services requiring migration.
